alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 10:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CATTARAUGUS...ERIE...NIAGARA AND EASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1038 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Niagara State Park to near Erie Basin Marina to near Lottsville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, Niagara Falls, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Jamestown, Clarence, Lockport, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, Hamburg, East Aurora, Salamanca, Williamsville, Allegany State Park, and Grand Island. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 49 and 58. Interstate 86 between exits 8 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
